Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka and West Indies are preparing to clash in a three-match T20I series starting on 13 October 2024.
Sri Lanka recently hosted India for a T20I series and faced a whitewash.
West Indies recently hosted South Africa for a T20I series and whitewashed them.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla.
The pitch is expected to be bowling-friendly and best suited for pace.
The weather forecast predicts overcast conditions with a temperature of 29°C and 60% chances of rain.
